summary: Replaces the main font with smaller Kingthings Petrock font (regular or light).
descriptionHtml:
This modification changes the default font to Kingthings Petrock (regular or light version). I reduced the original font size 20%. I hope you\'ll enjoy!

-------------------

Manual install:
Extract the files and move them into your Skyrim/Data/Interface folder. Overwrite if necessary. Please remember to back up your old files in case you need them later (if you have any).

Manual uninstall:
To uninstall, delete files named fonts_en2.swf and fontconfig.txt from your Skyrim/Data/Interface folder.

--------------------

Note: This is compatible with SkyUI and SkyUI-Away. In fact, this mod works even better with them.

--------------------

Feel free to check out my other font mod; Diablo font replacer at http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33618
author: Eckhart
